thread.section_title: Ancestry.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ancestry.com | www.ancestry.com
thread.title: Clarice Snowden

author: Clarice Snowden
title: Clarice Snowden
text: I signed up for the trial, still never got any results. Called to cancel through voice automated system as it suggested, but then the $99 still came out of my account which deemed my cable bill payment unable to be withdrawn causing a late fee for me and bank fees. Upon calling and waiting for live customer service, I had to wait on hold with loud music in my ear for 23 minutes before someone answered. As I started explaining the reason for my call, the Rep immediately got defensive and displayed major attitude throughout the remainder of the call. I will never use them or refer anyone to them.
